subject: Add favicon.ico and favicon.png to resolve 404 errors
body:
Browsers automatically request /favicon.ico and /favicon.png when
visiting the site. Added a public/ directory with both favicon formats
(blue circle with white "T" for tool-till-tees).

https://claude.ai/code/session_017JzDS8b1TvHRaS6LxzumWp
title: Add favicon.ico and favicon.png to resolve 404 errors
